nodes.title: Seedance 1.5 Pro
widgets_values:
Seedance 1.0 API Brings Your Stories to Life

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/seedance-1-5-pro](https://kie.ai/seedance-1-5-pro)

- Aspect Ratio: 9:16, 16:9 etc
- Resolution: 720p, 1080p
- Duration: 4, 8, 12 seconds
- Fixed Lens: Enable to keep the camera view static and stable. Disable for dynamic camera movement.
- Generate Audio: true or false

**Pricing (May change):** 
- 480P video — 4s no-audio 8 credits ($0.04) or with audio 14 credits ($0.07); 8s no-audio 14 credits ($0.07) or with audio 28 credits ($0.14); 12s no-audio 19 credits ($0.095) or with audio 38 credits ($0.19). 
- 720P video — 4s no-audio 14 credits ($0.07) or with audio 28 credits ($0.14); 8s no-audio 28 credits ($0.14) or with audio 56 credits ($0.28); 12s no-audio 42 credits ($0.21) or with audio 84 credits ($0.42)

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: Seedance V1 Pro Fast I2V
widgets_values:
Seedance 1.0 API Brings Your Stories to Life

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/bytedance/seedance-v1?model=bytedance%2Fv1-pro-fast-image-to-video](https://kie.ai/bytedance/seedance-v1?model=bytedance%2Fv1-pro-fast-image-to-video)

- Resolution: 720p, 1080p
- Duration: 5 or 10 seconds

**Pricing (May change):** 
- 720P — 16 credits (US$0.080) for 5s / 36 credits (US$0.180) for 10s; 
- 1080P — 36 credits (US$0.180) for 5s / 72 credits (US$0.360) for 10s.


Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: Kling 2.6 I2V
widgets_values:
Kling 2.6 is Kling AI’s audio-visual generation model that produces synchronized video, speech, ambient sound, and sound effects from text or image inputs.

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/kling-2-6](https://kie.ai/kling-2-6)

- Duration: 5 or 10 seconds
- Sound: this parameter is used to specify whether the generated video contains sound

**Pricing (May change):** 
- HD video 5s no-audio 55 credits ($0.28) / 10 s no-audio 110 credits ($0.55)
- With audio 5s 110 credits ($0.55) or 10 s 220 credits ($1.10)—

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: Nano Banana Pro
widgets_values:
Google Nano Banana Pro delivers sharper 2K imagery, intelligent 4K scaling.

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/nano-banana-pro](https://kie.ai/nano-banana-pro)

- Aspect Ratio: 9:16 etc
- Resolution 1K, 2K, 4K

Output format: png or jpg

**Pricing (May change):**
- 1K/2K 18 credits (~$0.09) 
- 4K 24 credits (~$0.12)

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: Kling 2.6 Motion I2V
widgets_values:
Kling AI 2.6 Motion Control API is a performance-driven image-to-video model that transfers real human motion, gestures, and expressions from reference video to character images with stable timing and realism.

**Playground:** [https://kie.ai/kling-2.6-motion-control](https://kie.ai/kling-2.6-motion-control)

- Output resolution (mode): 720, 1080
- character_orientation: Generate the orientation of the characters in the video. 'image': same orientation as the person in the picture (max 10s video). 'video': consistent with the orientation of the characters in the video (max 30s video).

## IMPORTANT - INPUT VIDEO
The duration must be between 3 to 30 seconds, and the video must clearly show the subject's head, shoulders, and torso.The minimum width and height for videos must be 720 pixels, and only jpeg/jpg/png image formats are supported.


**Pricing (May Change):** 
- 6 credits/s ($0.03) for 720p 
- 9 credits/s ($0.045) for 1080p

**NOTE** thats **per second costs**. Make sure to set the frame load cap on your **VHS Video Node** to 5, 10, etc for your input video otherwise you will get charged for whatever the input length is. 

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: SeedDream 4.5
widgets_values:
Seedream 4.5 is Bytedance’s refined image model for 4K generation, precise editing, and consistent multi-image output.

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/seedream-4-5](https://kie.ai/seedream-4-5)

- Aspect Ratio: 9:16, 16:9
- Quality: Basic outputs 2K images, while High outputs 4K images.


**Pricing (May change):** 
- 6.5 credits per image (≈ $0.032)

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

nodes.title: Kling 2.5 I2V
widgets_values:
Kling 2.5 is Kling AI’s audio-visual generation model that produces synchronized video, speech, ambient sound, and sound effects from text or image inputs.

**Great for First Frame Last Frame**

**Playground Link:** [https://kie.ai/kling-2-5?model=kling%2Fv2-5-turbo-image-to-video-pro](https://kie.ai/kling-2-5?model=kling%2Fv2-5-turbo-image-to-video-pro)

- Duration: 5 or 10 seconds
- CFG Scale: Classifier Free Guidance scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt
- Negative: Elements to avoid in the video, Min: 0, Max: 1, Step: 0.1

**Pricing (May change):** 
- 42 credits per 5s video ($0.21)
- 84 credits per 10s video ($0.42).

Latest pricing can be found here [https://kie.ai/pricing](https://kie.ai)

Make sure each cell of the grid has the woman and the poses should stike a balance between playful, sensual and sexy.

nodes.title: Model Links
widgets_values:
## ComfyUI KIE API Node Pack — Workflow Overview

This workflow uses a custom set of **ComfyUI nodes** that integrate with the **Kie.ai API** to test and experiment with image and video generation models inside ComfyUI.

These nodes are designed to reflect real model capabilities while staying easy to wire, debug, and reuse in modular workflows. They are especially useful for iterative testing, storyboard-style setups, and automation-driven pipelines.

**Help Support the Development**

Please use this link with our affiliate code to help support the further development of this node pack.
[https://kie.ai](https://kie.ai?ref=e7565cf24a7fad4586341a87eaf21e42)

Project repository:  
[https://github.com/gateway/ComfyUI-Kie-API](https://github.com/gateway/ComfyUI-Kie-API)

---

## Included Nodes

### Generation Nodes

- **Nano Banana Pro Image**  
   Image generation using the Nano Banana Pro model.

- **Seedream 4.5 Edit**  
  Text-to-image generation and image editing via Seedream models.

- **Kling 2.6 Image-to-Video**  
  Generate video from a single input image.

- **Kling 2.6 Motion-Control Image-to-Video**  
  Image-to-video generation with additional motion and camera control parameters.

- **Kling 2.6 Text-to-Video**  
  Generate video directly from a text prompt with configurable duration, aspect ratio, and sound options.

- **Kling 2.5 I2V**
  Generates video from a required first image and optional tail (lasst) image.

- **Seedance V1 Pro (Fast) Image-to-Video**  
  Fast image-to-video generation optimized for quick iteration.

- **Seedance 1.5 Pro Image-to-Video, Text-to-Video**  
  Higher-quality image-to-video generation using the Seedance 1.5 Pro model.

---

### Utility / Helper Nodes

- **GridSlice**  
  Splits grid images (2×2, 3×3, etc.) into individual images for downstream processing.

- **Parse Prompt Grid JSON**  
  Parses structured JSON (often generated by an LLM) into individual prompt outputs for multi-image or storyboard-style workflows.

---

## Notes on Usage & Debugging

- All generation requests are standard API calls made to **Kie.ai**:  
  [https://kie.ai/](https://kie.ai?ref=e7565cf24a7fad4586341a87eaf21e42)

- If a node fails, times out, or behaves unexpectedly, generated results may still be available in your Kie.ai account.

- You can review request history, parameters, and results here:  
  [https://kie.ai/logs](https://kie.ai/logs)

Checking the logs is often the fastest way to confirm whether a job completed successfully.

---

## Project Status

This node pack is an early, evolving release intended for experimentation and testing. Node behavior and interfaces may change as models and workflows are refined.

---

## Issues & Feedback

To report issues or request improvements related to this workflow,  
[go to GitHub](https://github.com/gateway/ComfyUI-Kie-API/issues)

Please include:
- the node name
- relevant parameters
- any error messages or logs

---

## Development & Sponsorship

Development of this node pack is supported by **Dreaming Computers**  
[https://dreamingcomputers.com](https://dreamingcomputers.com)

Dreaming Computers is an independent creative and technical practice focused on AI-driven visuals, automation workflows, and experimental tools for artists and technologists.

nodes.title: Check Credits
widgets_values:
Check Credits - Return remaining credits.

- Useful for checking to see if your API Key is working

[https://kie.ai/api-key](https://kie.ai/api-key)

To add your key:

- Edit config/kie_key.example.txt add your api key from above
- Save the file as kie_key.txt

DO NOT SHARE YOUR KEYS
